content:
I am currently working toward the M.Sc. degree in Control Science and Engineering with School of Automation Science and Electrical Engineering, Beihang University, directed by Prof. Xiwang Dong and Prof. Zhang Ren. My research interests focus on motion planning for mobile robots, such as aerial robots and unmanned ground vehicles.
In June 2021, I received the B.Eng. degree in Automatic Control from Beihang University, Beijing, China.
summary: I am currently working toward the M.Sc. degree in Control Science and Engineering with School of Automation Science and Electrical Engineering, Beihang University, directed by Prof. Xiwang Dong and Prof. Zhang Ren.
title: Yicheng Chen

summary: An RRT-based path planning algorithm enables UAVs to replan safe paths when dynamic threats emerge.
title: Adaptively Dynamic RRT*-Connect: Path Planning for UAVs Against Dynamic Obstacles

summary: A novel multi-UAV mobile edge computing framework, aiming to provide better Quality-of-Service and path planning based on reinforcement learning.
title: Multi-UAV Mobile Edge Computing and Path Planning Platform Based on Reinforcement Learning
